#include <iostream>
#include<map>
using namespace std;

map<int,bool> visit;

int bin_search(int a[], int n, int k){
	
	int low=0,high= n-1;
		
//	for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
//		cout<<a[i]<<" ";
	
	
	while(low<=high){
		int mid = (high+low)/2;
		
		if(a[mid] == k){
			return 1;
		
		if(a[mid]>k)
		high=mid-1;
		else
		low= mid+1;
		}
	}
	
	return -1;
}

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int n;
	cin>>n;
	visit.clear();
	int a[n+1],i;
	
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		cin>>a[i];
		visit[a[i]]=1;
	}
		
	int sum;
	cin>>sum;
	bool f=0;
	
	for(i=0;i<n;i++){
		int left = a[i];
		
		if(sum>=left && visit[sum-left]==1)
		{
			cout<<"YES\n";
			f=1;
			break;
		}
	}
	
	if(f==0)
	cout<<"NO\n";
	
	return 0;
}
